an10.24:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma mahacundo cetisu viharati sahajatiyam.
an10.24:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma mahacundo bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.24:1.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahacundassa paccassosum.
an10.24:2.3: Tance, avuso, bhikkhum lobho abhibhuyya titthati,
an10.24:2.12: papika iccha abhibhuyya titthati, so evamassa veditabbo:
an10.24:2.13: ‘nayamayasma tatha pajanati yatha pajanato lobho na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam lobho abhibhuyya titthati;
an10.24:2.14: nayamayasma tatha pajanati yatha pajanato doso na hoti …
an10.24:2.22: papika iccha na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam papika iccha abhibhuyya titthati’ti.
an10.24:3.3: Tance, avuso, bhikkhum lobho abhibhuyya titthati,

an10.24:3.13: ‘nayamayasma tatha pajanati yatha pajanato lobho na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam lobho abhibhuyya titthati;

an10.24:4.2: ‘janamimam dhammam, passamimam dhammam, bhavitakayomhi bhavitasilo bhavitacitto bhavitapanno’ti.
an10.24:4.3: Tance, avuso, bhikkhum lobho abhibhuyya titthati,
an10.24:4.12: papika iccha abhibhuyya titthati, so evamassa veditabbo:
an10.24:4.13: ‘nayamayasma tatha pajanati yatha pajanato lobho na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam lobho abhibhuyya titthati;

an10.24:5.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, puriso daliddova samano addhavadam vadeyya, adhanova samano dhanavavadam vadeyya, abhogova samano bhogavavadam vadeyya.
an10.24:5.2: So kismincideva dhanakaraniye samuppanne na sakkuneyya upanihatum dhanam va dhannam va rajatam va jatarupam va.
an10.24:5.4: ‘daliddova ayamayasma samano addhavadam vadeti, adhanova ayamayasma samano dhanavavadam vadeti, abhogavava ayamayasma samano bhogavavadam vadeti.
an10.24:5.6: Tatha hi ayamayasma kismincideva dhanakaraniye samuppanne na sakkoti upanihatum dhanam va dhannam va rajatam va jatarupam va’ti.
an10.24:6.1: Evamevam kho, avuso, nanavadanca bhikkhu vadamano bhavanavadanca:
an10.24:6.2: ‘janamimam dhammam, passamimam dhammam, bhavitakayomhi bhavitasilo bhavitacitto bhavitapanno’ti.
an10.24:6.3: Tance, avuso, bhikkhum lobho abhibhuyya titthati,

an10.24:6.22: papika iccha na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam papika iccha abhibhuyya titthati’ti.

an10.24:7.22: papika iccha na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam papika iccha nabhibhuyya titthati’ti.
